content.query:
-- Read Calendar.csv
-- Connect to Built in Serverless SQL Pool
-- Connect to nyc_taxi_discovery Database

use nyc_taxi_discovery
GO

SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET
(
 BULK 'calendar.csv',
 DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
 FORMAT = 'CSV',
 PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
 FIRSTROW = 2,
 FIELDTERMINATOR = ','
) AS result


-- Check the DataTypes
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET
(
 BULK ''calendar.csv'',
 DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
 FORMAT = ''CSV'',
 PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
 FIRSTROW = 2,
 FIELDTERMINATOR = '',''
) AS result'


-- Specify the Columns

SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET
(
 BULK 'calendar.csv',
 DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
 FORMAT = 'CSV',
 PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
 FIRSTROW = 2,
 FIELDTERMINATOR = ','
)WITH(
 date_key INT 1
,date date 2
,year INT 3
,month SMALLINT 4
,day SMALLINT 5
,day_name VARCHAR(15) 6
,day_of_year SMALLINT 7
,week_of_month SMALLINT 8
,week_of_year SMALLINT 9
,month_name VARCHAR(15) 10
,year_month INT 11
,year_week INT 12

) AS result
